body:
<!--StartFragment-->

From playing a piano at a very tender age, she is now a gospel singer, a songwriter, a worship leader and a recording artist. Meet "Corazon", Stars Light Records's rising star.\
\
Born and bred in Cameroon, the talented artist has decided to fully express her passion for God and the spread of his word.\
\
Recording countless onstage performances in church and anointed ministrations at evangelical crusades, multitudes have been pulled to salvation by her Holy Ghost filled personality.\
Not only is she talented, she is beauty with brains.\
\
Corazon takes center stage with her newly released video "Grace" from her debut album-"Just Believe".\
\
Despite being thrown into the spotlight, Corazon is most concerned about impacting lives with her music,

> "Music is my way of...ministering the gospel to my generation",

she says. We can only wish her well in her bid to save the world.\
\
You can watch the "Grace" video on her YouTube channel at 

For booking, follow Corazon on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram @Corazonworships. You can also log on to www.starslightentertainment.com for the latest news on your favourite celebs/celebrity (you can choose either one).



<!--EndFragment-->
summary:

\
Born and bred in Cameroon, the talented artist has decided to fully express her passion for God and the spread of his word.
